resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Maven RAT plugin is not checking all source files

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
mapreduce side of HADOOP-9097



Running 'mvn apache-rat:check' passes, but running RAT by hand (by downloading the JAR) produces some warnings for Java files, amongst others.
fields.summary: Maven RAT plugin is not checking all source files

comments.body: note my testing was done with all the other RAT jira referenced in HADOOP-9097.patch

{color:red}-1 overall{color}.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12564351/MAPREDUCE-4934.patch
  against trunk revision .

    {color:red}-1 patch{color}.  The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/3229//console

This message is automatically generated.
fixing patches.  I generated them wrong.

{color:red}-1 overall{color}.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12564420/MAPREDUCE-4934.patch
  against trunk revision .

    {color:green}+1 @author{color}.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    {color:green}+1 tests included{color}.  The patch appears to include 5 new or modified test files.

    {color:green}+1 javac{color}.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    {color:green}+1 javadoc{color}.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    {color:green}+1 eclipse:eclipse{color}.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    {color:green}+1 findbugs{color}.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    {color:green}+1 release audit{color}.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    {color:red}-1 core tests{color}.  The patch failed these unit tests in hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-common hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-core hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-hs hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-jobclient hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-examples:

                  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.v2.app.job.impl.TestJobImpl
                  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.v2.TestUberAM

    {color:green}+1 contrib tests{color}.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/3230//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/3230//console

This message is automatically generated.
Note, the combined patch with all related jiras was +1'd under HADOOP-9097.  If anyone else has comments let me know.
